response.overview: Even though Jack’s (Jack Desfeux) madly in love with his wife, he’s constantly on the prowl for a beautiful woman (Isa Bella) to fuck. He just can’t control himself. Every time he hears that his wife is going out for a while, he’s hooking up for a booty call behind his wife’s back. To make matters worse, he fucks them in the condo that they share. He doesn’t know how his wife would react so he tries his best not to get caught! Good luck with that Jack…
response.title: Don't Get Caught
